CONSCRIPTION.Definition: when people are made to join the armed forces

LANCER.Definition: a soldier carrying a long, sharp stick

AGENDA.Definition: the things that a party or group wants to achieve

PREDECESSOR.Definition: the person who held a position before someone else

PURGED.Definition: to get rid of a person from an organisation

AXIS.Definition: the countries (Germany, Japan, Italy & others) who fought against the Allies in World War Two

PARTISAN.Definition: the groups that fight against an occupying military force

COLLABORATED.Definition: worked together with another group or person

THRONE.Definition: the chair used by a king or queen

BARGAINING.Definition: discussing in order to reach an agreement

MOTHERSHIP.Definition: the larger ship from which smaller ships are launched

SATELLITE COUNTRIES.Definition: countries that are dependent on another, larger one

SUBSERVIENT.Definition: willing to do what someone else says

COURTING.Definition: trying to form an alliance with

GET ON THE WRONG SIDE OF.Definition: to cause someone to be angry (with you)

FELLOW.Definition: someone who is in the same situation

OBEDIENT.Definition: willing to do what someone else wants

WALKED THE LINE.Definition: managed to balance two different sides

BARGAINING POWER.Definition: the ability of a person or organisation to get what they want

RELIEF.Definition: a feeling of comfort when something you don't like is not there any more

RECONCILIATION.Definition: when two parties become friends again

CONSTITUTION.Definition: the set of political principles by which a country is governed

PERSECUTION.Definition: to treat a people unfairly over a long period of time

CONTEMPORARIES.Definition: people in the same position as you

CULT OF PERSONALITY.Definition: when people are encouraged to admire a famous person, often politician

RUTHLESS.Definition: not worrying about the impact on others

FRAGMENTED.Definition: formed of lots of different parts

PICKING UP THE MANTLE.Definition: to continue a job that someone else was doing

MAUSOLEUM.Definition: the building where someone important is buried
